item.title: Leetcode093. Restore IP Addresses
item.dc:creator: suzumiya natsuhi
item.description:
1. Restore IP Addresses

Solution 


class Solution {
  public:
    vector<string> addresses;
    vector<string> restoreIpAddresses(string s) {
        vector<string> path;
        dfs(s, path);
        return addresses;
    }

    void dfs(string s, vector<string> &path) {

        if (s == "" && path.size() == 4) {
            string tmp = "";
            for (string s : path) {
                if (tmp != "")
                    tmp += ".";
                tmp += s;
            }
            addresses.push_back(tmp);
            return;
        }

        if (path.size() > 4 || s == "")
            return;

        for (int i = 1; i <= s.length(); i++) {
            string ip = s.substr(0, i);
            if (i > 1 && s[0] == '0')
                return;
            if (stoi(ip) > 255)
                break;
            path.push_back(ip);
            dfs(s.substr(i, s.length() - i), path);
            path.pop_back();
        }
    }
};



Status: Accepted (147/147)

Runtime: 4 ms, faster than 81.89% of C++ submissions.

Memory Usage: 7.6 MB, less than 13.80% of C++ submissions.

第一次嘗試是忽略了 10.0.010.0 中的 010 是不能作爲一個符合要求的 ip 段。所以添加了 if(i > 1 && s[0] = ’0’)return;= 這一段，雖然丑但是很有用。

item.title: Leetcode543. Diameter of Binary Tree
item.dc:creator: suzumiya natsuhi
item.description:
543. Diameter of Binary Tree

Solution 


/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left),
 * right(right) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
  public:
    int diameter = 0;
    int diameterOfBinaryTree(TreeNode *root) {
        depthTravel(root);
        return diameter;
    }
    int depthTravel(TreeNode *root) {
        if (root == nullptr)
            return 0;
        int left = depthTravel(root->left);
        int right = depthTravel(root->right);
        diameter = max(left + right, diameter);
        return 1 + max(left, right);
    }
};



Status: Accepted (106/106)

Runtime: 12 ms, faster than 88.39% of C++ submissions.

Memory Usage: 21 MB, less than 13.09% of C++ submissions.

同樣的是一個樹遍歷的題目。不過第一次做的時候因爲想用一個函數解決問題，但是好像是不行的。因爲遞歸返回值如果是最長的直徑的話，就無法只用一個單一的返回值來構造這個函數，又不能修改參數。所以遞歸函數的返回值需要更多的信息，因此還是藉助了返回值爲結點高度的函數 depthTravel 。

item.title: Leetcode901. Sort Array By Parity
item.dc:creator: suzumiya natsuhi
item.description:
901. Sort Array By Parity

Solution 


class Solution {
  public:
    vector<int> sortArrayByParity(vector<int> &A) {
        sort(begin(A), end(A),
             [](auto &a, auto &b) { return a % 2 == 0 && b % 2 == 1; });
        return A;
    }
};




Status: Accepted (285/285)

Runtime: 36 ms, faster than 19.11% of C++ submissions.

Memory Usage: 16.6 MB, less than 16.48% of C++ submissions.

模仿 0947 reorder-data-in-log-files 题目的写法。

item.title: Leetcode733. Flood Fill
item.dc:creator: suzumiya natsuhi
item.description:
733. Flood Fill

Solution 


class Solution {
  public:
    vector<vector<int>>
    floodFill(vector<vector<int>> &image, int sr, int sc, int newColor) {
        int old_color = image[sr][sc];
        if (old_color == newColor)
            return image;

        floodFill(image, sr, sc, newColor, old_color);

        return image;
    }

    void floodFill(vector<vector<int>> &image,
                   int sr,
                   int sc,
                   int newColor,
                   int oldColor) {
        // paint
        image[sr][sc] = newColor;

        // paint others
        if (sr - 1 >= 0 && oldColor == image[sr - 1][sc])
            floodFill(image, sr - 1, sc, newColor);
        if (sr + 1 < image.size() && oldColor == image[sr + 1][sc])
            floodFill(image, sr + 1, sc, newColor);
        if (sc - 1 >= 0 && oldColor == image[sr][sc - 1])
            floodFill(image, sr, sc - 1, newColor);
        if (sc + 1 < image[0].size() && oldColor == image[sr][sc + 1])
            floodFill(image, sr, sc + 1, newColor);
    }
};



Status: Accepted (277/277)

Runtime: 12 ms, faster than 97.05% of C++ submissions.

Memory Usage: 14.9 MB, less than 5.01% of C++ submissions.

第一次做的时候忽略了没有保存 old_color ，后面有问题。

item.title: Leetcode696. Count Binary Substrings
item.dc:creator: suzumiya natsuhi
item.description:
696. Count Binary Substrings 


class Solution {
  public:
    int countBinarySubstrings(string s) {
        if (s == "")
            return 0;
        vector<int> vi_pos;
        for (int i = 1; i < s.length(); i++) {
            if (s[i] != s[i - 1])
                vi_pos.push_back(i);
        }
        int count = 0, left, right;
        for (int i = 0; i < vi_pos.size(); i++) {
            left = vi_pos[i] - (i == 0 ? 0 : vi_pos[i - 1]);
            right = ((i == vi_pos.size() - 1) ? s.length() : vi_pos[i + 1]) -
                    vi_pos[i];
            count += min(left, right);
        }
        return count;
    }
};



Status: Accepted (90/90)

Runtime: 40 ms, faster than 99.85% of C++ submissions.

Memory Usage: 14.4 MB, less than 6.03% of C++ submissions.

这道题我在 right = ((i = vipos.size() - 1) ? s.length() : vipos[i + 1]) - vipos[i];= 的时候把 s.length() 写成了 vi_pos.size() ，一直没有检查出来。后来代码拆开了几个变量用 gdb 调试出来了 right 值的问题。隐藏得太深了。

item.title: Leetcode687. Longest Univalue Path
item.dc:creator: suzumiya natsuhi
item.description:
687. Longest Univalue Path

Solution 


/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left),
 * right(right) {}
 * };
 */

class Solution {
  public:
    int luvp = 0;
    int longestUnivaluePath(TreeNode *root) {
        if (root == nullptr)
            return 0;
        travelPath(root);
        return luvp - 1;
    }

    int travelPath(TreeNode *root) {
        int left = 0, right = 0;
        if (root->left != nullptr)
            left = travelPath(root->left);
        if (root->right != nullptr)
            right = travelPath(root->right);
        int left_tmp =
            ((root->left && root->left->val == root->val) ? left : 0);
        int right_tmp =
            ((root->right && root->right->val == root->val) ? right : 0);
        luvp = max(luvp, 1 + left_tmp + right_tmp);
        return 1 + max(left_tmp, right_tmp);
    }
};



Status: Accepted (71/71)

Runtime: 184 ms, faster than 86.14% of C++ submissions.

Memory Usage: 72.6 MB, less than 5.21% of C++ submissions.

第一次做的时候没有做出来，觉得有点复杂。不过说到底还只是一个简单的树遍历，当然可以认为和求树深度的那类题其实差不多。其中每个点的处理就是找到是否比现有的最长路径 luvp 更长的 1 + left_tmp + right_tmp ，然后返回的若是 1 + left_tmp + right_tmp ，那么得出来的结果不是 最长的path ，而是相同值最多的相邻点个数。所以最后修改一下，返回稍长的路径即可。

树的题，递归是最简洁的。

item.title: Leetcode617. Merge Two Binary Trees
item.dc:creator: suzumiya natsuhi
item.description:
617. Merge Two Binary Trees

Solution 


/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left),
 * right(right) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
  public:
    TreeNode *mergeTrees(TreeNode *t1, TreeNode *t2) {
        if (t1 == NULL && t2 == NULL)
            return NULL;
        TreeNode *t3 = new TreeNode((t1 == NULL ? 0 : t1->val) +
                                    (t2 == NULL ? 0 : t2->val));
        t3->left = mergeTrees(t1 == NULL ? NULL : t1->left,
                              t2 == NULL ? NULL : t2->left);
        t3->right = mergeTrees(t1 == NULL ? NULL : t1->right,
                               t2 == NULL ? NULL : t2->right);
        return t3;
    }
};



Status: Accepted (183/183)

Runtime: 56 ms, faster than 47.43% of C++ submissions.

Memory Usage: 35.7 MB, less than 5.05% of C++ submissions.

item.title: Leetcode668. Employee Importance
item.dc:creator: suzumiya natsuhi
item.description:
690. Employee Importance 


/*
// Definition for Employee.
class Employee {
public:
    int id;
    int importance;
    vector<int> subordinates;
};
*/

class Solution {
  public:
    int getImportance(vector<Employee *> employees, int id) {

        unordered_map<int, Employee *> umii;
        for (Employee *e : employees) {
            umii[e->id] = e;
        }

        int importance = 0;
        queue<int> qi;
        qi.push(id);

        int tmp;
        while (!qi.empty()) {
            tmp = qi.front();
            importance += umii[tmp]->importance;
            qi.pop();
            for (int i : umii[tmp]->subordinates)
                qi.push(i);
        }

        return importance;
    }
};




Status: Accepted (108/108)

Runtime: 36 ms, faster than 92.63% of C++ submissions.

Memory Usage: 14.4 MB, less than 27.87% of C++ submissions.

item.title: Leetcode649 Second Minimum Node In a Binary Tree
item.dc:creator: suzumiya natsuhi
item.description:
671. Second Minimum Node In a Binary Tree

Solution 


/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * struct TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode *left;
 *     TreeNode *right;
 *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}
 *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left),
 * right(right) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
  public:
    int fm = -1, sm = -1;
    int findSecondMinimumValue(TreeNode *root) {
        if (root == NULL)
            return sm;

        if (fm == -1)
            fm = root->val;
        else {
            if (sm == -1) {
                if (root->val > fm)
                    sm = root->val;
                else if (root->val < fm) {
                    sm = fm;
                    fm = root->val;
                } else {
                    // do nothing
                }
            } else {
                if (root->val > sm) {
                    // do noting
                } else if (root->val < fm) {
                    sm = fm;
                    fm = root->val;
                } else if (root->val == sm || root->val == fm) {
                    // do nothing
                } else { // root->val > fm and root->val < sm;
                    sm = root->val;
                }
            }
        }

        findSecondMinimumValue(root->left);
        findSecondMinimumValue(root->right);

        return sm;
    }
};



Status: Accepted (35/35)

Runtime: 0 ms, faster than 100.00% of C++ submissions.

Memory Usage: 7.2 MB, less than 17.00% of C++ submissions.

自从学会了一种偷懒的写法之后，就一直用这种 travel 的方法。

item.title: Leetcode804 Most Common Word
item.dc:creator: suzumiya natsuhi
item.description:
819. Most Common Word

Solution 


class Solution {
  public:
    string mostCommonWord(string paragraph, vector<string> &banned) {
        unordered_map<string, int> umsi;
        int start, end;
        transform(paragraph.begin(),paragraph.end(),paragraph.begin(),::tolower);
        for (int i = 0; i < paragraph.length(); i++) {
            while (i < paragraph.length() && !isalpha(paragraph[i]))
                i++;
            start = i;
            while (i < paragraph.length() && isalpha(paragraph[i]))
                i++;
            end = i;
            umsi[paragraph.substr(start, end - start)]++;
        }

        for (string s : banned)
            if (umsi.find(s) != umsi.end())
                umsi.erase(s);

        string w = "";
        for (auto it : umsi) {
            if (w == "")
                w = it.first;
            else if (umsi[it.first] > umsi[w])
                w = it.first;
        }

        return w;
    }
};



Status: Accepted (47/47)

Runtime: 4 ms, faster than 99.63% of C++ submissions.

Memory Usage: 7.8 MB, less than 87.14% of C++ submissions.
